species.name: Human
species.description: Versatile and ambitious. Humans adapt to a variety of roles and excel in any field they choose.
traits: Extra Skill: Gain proficiency in one extra skill.
Flexible Stats: Distribute ability score bonuses as you like.

species.name: Elf
species.description: Graceful and wise. Elves are known for their keen senses, longevity, and connection to magic.
traits: Darkvision: See in dim light and darkness.
Keen Senses: Proficiency in the Perception skill.

species.name: Dwarf
species.description: Stout and sturdy. Dwarves are skilled craftsmen and fierce warriors.
traits: Stonecunning: Gain bonuses on stone-related knowledge.

species.name: Halfling
species.description: Small, nimble, and resourceful. Halflings are known for their luck and bravery.
traits: Lucky: Re-roll 1s on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.
Brave: Advantage on saving throws against fear.

species.name: Dragonborn
species.description: Born of dragons, proud and strong. Dragonborn are known for their draconic ancestry and breath weapon.
traits: Damage Resistance: Resistance to specific damage types based on ancestry.

species.name: Tiefling
species.description: Fiendish ancestry with a touch of infernal power. Tieflings possess innate magical abilities and a resistance to fire.
traits: Infernal Legacy: Gain innate spellcasting abilities.

species.name: Half-Orc
species.description: Strong and resilient, with a savage grace. Half-orcs excel in combat and are driven by a fierce determination.
traits: Relentless Endurance: Avoid death once per long rest.
Savage Attacks: Deal extra damage on critical hits.

species.name: Gnome
species.description: Inventive and curious. Gnomes are skilled tinkerers and spellcasters.
traits: Gnome Cunning: Advantage on saving throws against magic.
Artificer's Lore: Bonus to history checks on magical items.

species.name: Half-Elf
species.description: A blend of human ambition and elven grace. Half-elves are charismatic and adaptable.
traits: Fey Ancestry: Resistance to charm and immunity to magical sleep.
Versatile Stats: Distribute bonuses to ability scores.
